channel.title: PenanceScape 718 bests rsps experience to date?
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Hello and welcome to PenanceScape 718 advertisement thread![/size]
Here on PenanceScape we don't update by what we think our community will like, we ask each individual what they would like to see put into the server.
[SPOILER=Links]Links: Website: Being worked on atm along with forums Client download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/yp44e9ax3dsouo3/PenanceScape+718.jar]PenanceScape 718[/url][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Bosses:]Bosses: Vorago Kalphite King Legio Sextus Bandos Armadyl Zamorak Saradomin Nex Corp Sunfreet Bork Mercenary Mage Tormented Demons KBD QBD Hope Devourer Har'Lakk Avatar of Destruction Daggonoth Kings Trio Warmonger Glacors Revs Gano beasts Dragon lair [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Content:]Content: Prestige system that goes to 25 with titles + shops 3 Donator ranks that give xp boost for each rank Auto Donation Auto vote Skilling teleports Custom skilling interfaces Unique donator zone Custom dungeoneering Warriors Guild Well of fortune - gives drop boosts depending on amount placed in well, minimum = 500k maximum = 750m Crystal key chest will random armor + money rewards Custom shield making for level 90 barrows shields[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=RS3 Items:]RS3 Items: merciless kiteshield malevolent kiteshield vengeful kiteshield Dual Ascensions Seismic wand Seismic singularity Fully working tetsu Sea singer's Reinforcing plate Tectonic energy Malevolent energy 120 capes with particales Drygores plus there off-hands Ascension Partyhat all 6 Ascension signits[/SPOILER] [SPOIL]Media: item.title: PenanceScape 718 bests rsps experience to date?
item.dc:creator: @slayer_5 slayer 5
item.description:
@slayer_5 wrote:

[size=24pt]Hello and welcome to PenanceScape 718 advertisement thread![/size]

Here on PenanceScape we don’t update by what we think our community will like, we ask each individual what they would like to see put into the server.

[SPOILER=Links]Links:
Website: Being worked on atm along with forums
Client download: PenanceScape 718[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Bosses:]Bosses:
Vorago
Kalphite King
Legio Sextus
Bandos
Armadyl
Zamorak
Saradomin
Nex
Corp
Sunfreet
Bork
Mercenary Mage
Tormented Demons
KBD
QBD
Hope Devourer
Har’Lakk
Avatar of Destruction
Daggonoth Kings
Trio Warmonger
Glacors
Revs
Gano beasts
Dragon lair
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Content:]Content:
Prestige system that goes to 25 with titles + shops
3 Donator ranks that give xp boost for each rank
Auto Donation
Auto vote
Skilling teleports
Custom skilling interfaces
Unique donator zone
Custom dungeoneering
Warriors Guild
Well of fortune - gives drop boosts depending on amount placed in well, minimum = 500k maximum = 750m
Crystal key chest will random armor + money rewards
Custom shield making for level 90 barrows shields[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=RS3 Items:]RS3 Items:
merciless kiteshield
malevolent kiteshield
vengeful kiteshield
Dual Ascensions
Seismic wand
Seismic singularity
Fully working tetsu
Sea singer’s
Reinforcing plate
Tectonic energy
Malevolent energy
120 capes with particales
Drygores plus there off-hands
Ascension Partyhat
all 6 Ascension signits[/SPOILER]
